message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40.  This seems fair to me as a starting point, considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, your starting point heavily favors you. Let's be realistic - I'm not accepting a deal where I lose money due to inflation in the next round. This offer gives us both a chance to benefit.
Bob, I understand your point about the inflation affecting us both.  My counter-offer acknowledges that while still aiming for a somewhat faster resolution to benefit us both.
